product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsSqueeze Me More Lip Balm Duo
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganThe juiciest lip set for hydrated lips with a sheer kiss of natural-looking color. e.l.f. Cosmetics' Squeeze Me More Lip Balm Duo features 2 of the fan-fave pocket-sized lip balms in Mango and Watermelon scents and shades.
details: DetailsBenefitsIncludes 2 Squeeze Me Lip Balms the scents and shades, Mango & WatermelonLightweight, hydrating formulaSuper sheer kiss of natural-looking colorSqueeze tube with slanted tip applicator for easy application on the goBoosted with nourishing ingredientsCruelty-free, e.l.f. is Leaping Bunny Certifiede.l.f. is proud to partner with Fair Trade USA & manufacture products in Fair Trade Certified facilities; look for the Fair Trade Certified seal on your e.l.f. productFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanHydroquinoneItem 2623032How To UseApply a generous, even layer directly to lips.Reapply as needed.IngredientsMango: Triisostearin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentaisostearate, Dextrin Palmitate, Fragrance (Parfum), Ethylhexylglycerin, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Squalane, Simethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Water (Aqua), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Maltodextrin, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xanthan Gum, Calcium Pantothenate, Caprylyl Glycol, Urea, Magnesium Lactate, Papain, Soluble Collagen, Potassium Lactate, Proline, Alanine, Serine, Magnesium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Limonene, Eugenol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Cl 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850).Watermelon: Triisostearin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentaisostearate, Dextrin Palmitate, Fragrance (Parfum), Ethylhexylglycerin, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Squalane, Simethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Water (Aqua), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Maltodextrin, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xanthan Gum, Calcium Pantothenate, Caprylyl Glycol, Urea, Magnesium Lactate, Papain, Soluble Collagen, Potassium Lactate, Proline, Alanine, Serine, Magnesium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Benzyl Benzoate. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Cl 77891), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: Apply a generous, even layer directly to lips.Reapply as needed.
ingredients: Benzyl Benzoate. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Cl 77891)

reviews.headline: I didn't fall in love with this lip gloss
reviews.comments: This was not glossy enough for me.

reviews.headline: So tasty and shiny!!!
reviews.comments: Love the light tint it leaves on my lips. Leaves my lips feeling soft and looking so glossy. Just the slightest bit sticky if I go crazy with it, but otherwise, so good!!! Tastes so yummy.

reviews.headline: Normal title
reviews.comments: So good, def recommend! Got this at a good price and has grest flavor/scent. Perfect combo

reviews.headline: Get it!
reviews.comments: I didnt even know that Elf sold these, so when I seen these at the store and it was $8.00 for two, I had to buy because I am a lipgloss girly and it's Elf! I love Laneige because of the texture and how it feels/looks on my lips and I kid you not, this is definitely a dupe for way less of the cost! I think I like it even more! ü´£ I only bought this pack, but I will definitely be buying them all! üôÇ

reviews.headline: Best lip balm i've tried
reviews.comments: These lip balms (the squeeze me in general) are the best lip balms ive ever tried, i continue to repurchase them and ive pur my family members onto these as well! The mango one is my all time holy grail, i just wish i could purchase it separately!

reviews.headline: Yummmm
reviews.comments: What's not to like from ELF?! These balms are very affordable and smells so good. They keep my lips moist, especially when I use them at night!

reviews.headline: So yummy!
reviews.comments: Hydrating & smell amazing!!

reviews.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.comments: I love lip balm this so much!!!!! You need to get this lip balm, it's so cheap affordable, and it gives such a beautiful shine and tint to the lips! My lips feel so moisturized, and I will definitely repurchase!

reviews.headline: I will definitely repurchase!!!!
reviews.comments: These lip balms are so perfect! They are not sticky but still give the lips a nice, soft look to them after applying! I have 5 of the squeeze me lip balms and love them! Great scents and a slight tint to all of them! Overall, they are worth the money and would recommend!

reviews.headline: just ehh
reviews.comments: nothing special, but for price point its good

reviews.headline: I would  buy again
reviews.comments: Na

reviews.headline: Nothing special
reviews.comments: This is an overhyped lip balm. There is NOTHING  balmy about it. It is heavely scented and nothing special. The best way I can describe it is think of kids makeup. I was deeply disappointed. I was hoping for some hydrated lips but these were lacking.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: Nice for the price but doesn't last super long
Very smooth going on the lips and the smell is amazing

reviews.headline: Juicy
reviews.comments: I loveeeeee the mango lip gloss! It smells just like a mango and makes my lips shine bright. I bought a few to give as a gift to my sisters but kept the mango for myself. :)

reviews.headline: recommend
reviews.comments: they are amazing .they both smell so good I definitely recommend you get them

reviews.headline: Love this!!!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
reviews.comments: I love this so much I bought every single flavor they have!!!!! I love the smell and the texture of all of these!!!!!!!!!! I would totally recommend this to anyone and everyone!! I love this so much I bought all my friends them for Christmas!!!!!!!!!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Product is amazing on the lips

reviews.headline: I would I buy this product
reviews.comments: It's smooth

reviews.headline: Had High Hopes...
reviews.comments: I had high hopes due to how good the vanilla, strawberry and peach were (I don't have the honey dew one)  and those hopes weren't disappointed! The first one I purchased was the vanilla and it just blew me away with what $4 could get you. The mango scent reminds me of mango Italian ice, which is one of my favorite summer treats. The watermelon one reminds me of watermelons and it smells very sweet but not to sweet! Of course the containers aren't huge but again don't forget how much you paid. A lot of people seem to be bothered by how it isn't filled all the way, but I've had the other ones for a long time and I have yet to get to the point where they are a struggle to come out. My point is that they go a long way. Another thing I love is that they moisturize my lips but also have a glossy look to them which like great. I hope this review helps!

faceoff_positive.comments: This just dropped and there's already reviews the second it dropped. It's not fair for others who come along later on to purchase and dk those comments aren't legit. This is almost everything elf puts new on their site, there's the option to review without even receiving and actually reviewing the product. Wish there was a way to report those fake reviews. Just some advice don't listen to the first few comments they wouldn't know unless (like the person under me said) they got it in pr or something which I highly doubt. Some people rely on buying products off of the reviews so please stop posting before you even TRY the product. So aggravating!!!! Please elf change the option to only post reviews if you actually got the product and also make a like , dislike and report button
faceoff_positive.headline: This just dropped

faceoff_negative.comments: I thought I would have loved the mango smell, but it smells like a synthetic mango and not what I was hoping for. It turns my stomach pretty fast and smells like shampoo. The watermelon however is very nostalgic it smells like a specific niche childhood DVD case that I had as a kid. If I could buy just the watermelon you guys would be sold out! The watermelon is replacing the strawberry in my daily routine üíò I have my fingers crossed for a pineapple batch soon ü§ûüèΩ
faceoff_negative.headline: Watermelon is superior and the best smell yet!
